tool_description: Retrieves complete or partial sacred texts from specified religious traditions and canonical sources.

tradition.description: Religious tradition (Christianity, Islam, Judaism, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, etc.)

text_name.description: Name of the sacred text (e.g., Bible, Quran, Torah, Bhagavad Gita)

error_messages: Unknown tradition: Specify a recognized religious tradition from the supported list.
Text not found: The specified sacred text is not available in our database for this tradition.
Invalid reference format: Use standard citation format for book and chapter references.
Translation unavailable: The requested translation is not available for this text.
usage: Provide the religious tradition and text name; optionally specify book_chapter and translation. Returns the requested text content with proper attribution.

canonical_status.description: Canonical authority level of the text
